title: Feedback Center
subtitle: Help us improve GrapholexInsight with your feedback

form.submitDescription: Fill out the form to share your experience and suggestions
form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: Briefly describe the issue or suggestion
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide specific details, steps to reproduce the issue, or improvement ideas

success.title: Feedback Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your contribution. Your feedback helps us continuously improve GrapholexInsight.

myFeedback.title: My Feedback
myFeedback.empty: You haven't submitted any feedback yet

rateApp.title: Overall GrapholexInsight Rating
rateApp.description: Share your overall experience with the application...

recommendations.title: Recommendation for GrapholexInsight
recommendations.description: How likely would you recommend GrapholexInsight to your colleagues? Share your reasoning...

validation.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
validation.npsRange: NPS score must be between 0 and 10

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback? This action cannot be undone.
delete.successMessage: The feedback has been successfully deleted.
delete.errorMessage: Unable to delete the feedback. Please try again later.

deleteAll.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete ALL your feedback? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove your entire history.
deleteAll.successMessage: All your feedback has been successfully deleted.
deleteAll.errorMessage: Unable to delete all feedback. Please try again later.
